title: Per Capita Personal Consumption Expenditures: Goods: Durable Goods: Furnishings and Durable Household Equipment for United States
notes:
Personal consumption expenditures of a given area divided by the resident population of the area.

Purchases of furniture and furnishings, household appliances, glassware, tableware, and household utensils, and tools and equipment for house and garden.For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/pce/pce_newsrelease.htm.
